body.p: AirClassroom is a simple and easy way to get access to a classroom for courses, meetings, or presentations. AirClassroom is currenlty renting out rooms 360 and 180 in Shanks Hall at Virginia Tech.

Shanks Hall 360 is a fairly large room with a ceiling mounted projector, a dcoument reader and several computers along the walls and down the center of the room. This is perfect for meeting the needs of a club or small organization.
